question: Match items in the List-I (Power Station) with those in the List-II (State) and select the correct answer using the codes given below the list:
explanation:
• Kothagudem Thermal Power Station is located at Paloncha in Telangana. The power plant has an installed capacity of 1,720 MW.
• Raichur Thermal Power Station is a coal-fired electric power station located at Deosugur in the Raichur district of the state of Karnataka.
• The Mettur Thermal Power Station is a coal-fired electric power station located in Salem district of Tamil Nadu. It is operated by Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation Limited.
• Wanakbori Thermal Power Station is a coal-fired power station in Gujarat, India. It is located on the bank of Mahi River in Kheda district. There are eight units at this location, seven of each 210 MW and one of 800 MW capacities.
